display_name: [Destroyers Born of Dragon Balls] Legion of Shadow Dragons

kit.leader_skill: "GT Bosses" Category Ki +4 and HP, ATK & DEF +150%

super_attack.name: Shadow Dragons' Assault (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK for 1 turn,; causes colossal damage to enemy; and lowers ATK & DEF

ultra_super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK for 1 turn,; causes mega-colossal damage and; greatly lowers ATK & DEF; A high chance of stunning the enemy

passive_skill.name: Resonant Minus Energy
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Ki +4 and ATK & DEF 177% up; (Forever) "GT Bosses" Category allies' Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 40% up; Per "GT Bosses" Category ally or Extreme Class ally on the team (depending on which has more members): ATK & DEF 30% up; Damage reduction rate 7% up; When all allies are Extreme Class characters or "GT Bosses" Category characters: Attacks are effective against all Types; All allies' ATK & DEF 17% up; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 77% up; When attacking with 18 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 77% up; When attacking with 24 Ki: Chance of performing a critical hit 77% up; When the target enemy is in the following status: or: Ki +7 and ATK 77% up

active_skill.name: Shadow Dragons' Awakening
active_skill.effect: Ki +7; All enemies'; ATK & DEF -30% for 1 turn
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated starting from the 7th turn from the start of battle (once only)
